3: Power supply damaged... Insufficient power in weather engine Group B...
(Nails the guard to the wall with an arrow) That's weird... It's broadcasting the warning about the power supply, but Nat's not here, and it's the only guard present...
Insufficient power in weather engine Group C... Insufficient power in cooling systems Group D, Group E, Group F...
(Checks the alarm receiver inside the guard's head) It hasn't turned on the alarm receiver, which means it's just broadcasting the warning itself...?
Temperature of weather engine rising... 20 minutes until danger threshold... Correction—correcting projection...
11 minutes until danger threshold... Correction—correcting projection...
6 minutes until danger threshold... Correction—correcting projection...
1 minute until danger threshold... Correction—correcting projection...
Temperature of weather engine... has reached the danger threshold... I repeat... Danger threshold reached...
(Realizes the severity) If this continues... the Golden Vortex is going to...
Establishing communications... Keep trying until I'm connected... Ignore all warnings!
(Leaves in a hurry) I have to find Karenina before returning to the commandant.
The eyes of the motionless guard suddenly flash red...
